name: Ninja Acension
description:
This is my submission for the Mini game jam 82 Doodle with the limitation one room. It's stated that the theme 'doodle' does not have to be followed explicitly and sadly this time around I was not able to completely follow the theme in a way I was happy, However I am still within the limition of one room, as none of my gameplay has closed off zones :)

Ninja Acension is one of those fun feeling types of games which I tried to make movement feel good. Gameplay is pretty sweet if you enjoy zipping around like a ninja! 

CONTROLS
WASD = Movement
Space = Jump
Left-Click-Mouse = Fire
E = Interact
